DOC.brief_title: Trial Evaluate Topical C-82 Psoriasis Plaque Test
DOC.detailed_description: The primary objective trial evaluate antipsoriatic efficacy C-82 topical gel compare vehicle measurement thickness Echo Lucent Band ( ELB ) psoriatic infiltrate use 20 MHz sonography . To gain additional information possible efficacy change test field compare untreated plaque clinically assess visual scoring .
